content: joanna is a 10 inch square which i designed for the bamcal 2023 on ravelry with double knit yarn and hooksize 4mm it will be 10 inch if you use worsted/aran weight yarn with a 5/5 5 mm hook it will be 12 inch the pattern is available in us and uk terms you have the options to choose the pdf with the phototutorial and the pdf as written only just 1 photo a separate pdf is included which provides details of yarn amounts used per round and colour schemes for 2 3 5 or 7 colours the colours used for the photo tutorial are white and pistachio if you want to use just 1 colour you have to scroll all the way down in the pdf where you find the instructions if you want to see more of my work then please visit my page on facebook https //www facebook com/profile php id=100063697653084 happy hooking l♥ve ineke
